name: A Small Game in a Small World
name_original: A Small Game in a Small World
description:
My Ludum Dare 38 submission and first finished project. Level editor and engine written with Processing.

Navigate the caves and cliffs of a nighttime landscape in search of twenty fireflies.

The simple controls provides you the largest challenge. Will you succeed?

CONTROLS:

- Position the mouse left and right of center to move

- Left-click to jump
